caption:
Addressing the world’s greatest challenges requires more than investing in transformative technologies—it demands building societal acceptance. This begins with actively listening to people’s hopes and concerns about breakthrough science.

@leapsbybayer, our impact investment arm, collaborated with @bcg and market research by @IPSOS_UK to conduct one of the largest surveys on global public sentiment towards transformative technology. 

Over 13,000 participants from 13 countries were asked about their outlook. 72% of respondents express confidence in the direction of science and technology. 

At Bayer, these insights fuel our mission and support our drive to innovate responsibly and communicate meaningfully. Whether it’s advancing cell and gene therapies to tackle Parkinson’s disease or revolutionizing agriculture to help work towards food security, we remain committed to leading with science and building trust.

Find the link to the full report in our bio.
